Trigger.Name: PLD Keypresses (Numpad Key OGCDs)
Trigger.Description:
Keep disabled to prevent it from accidentally firing
Call with conditions enabled - need this so that the triggers here check their own conditions

ConditionSingle.ExpressionL: max(${var:Atonement Ready Duration},${var:Supplication Ready Duration},${var:Sepulchre Ready Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

max(${var:Sheltron Duration},${var:Sentinel Duration},${var:Hallowed Ground Duration},${var:Bulwark Duration},${var:Passage of Arms Duration},${var:Holy Sheltron Duration},${var:Guardian Duration},${var:Rampart Duration},${var:Arm's Length Duration})-${_systemtimems}

Action.Description: 96+1 is Num0 96+10 is Num9 96+11 is Num* 96+12 is Num+

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Rage of Halone|Goring Blade|Royal Authority|Atonement|Supplication|Sepulchre|Holy Spirit)$
^(?:Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Shield Bash|Total Eclipse|Rage of Halone|Prominence|Royal Authority)$

Action.Description: Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD

ConditionSingle.ExpressionL: max(${var:Atonement Ready Duration},${var:Supplication Ready Duration},${var:Sepulchre Ready Duration})-${_systemtimems}

Action.Description: Atonement / Supplication / Sepulchre (Level 94+ Fight or Flight)

ConditionSingle.ExpressionL: max(${var:Atonement Ready Duration},${var:Supplication Ready Duration},${var:Sepulchre Ready Duration})-${_systemtimems}

Action.Description: Blade of Faith / Blade of Truth / Blade of Valor

Trigger.Name: PLD Actions
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^(?<type>2[12])\|(?<timestamp>[^|]*)\|(?<sourceId>[^|]*)\|(?<source>[^|]*)\|(?<id>[^|]*)\|(?<ability>Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Total Eclipse|Shield Bash|Shield Lob|Rage of Halone|Prominence|Goring Blade|Royal Authority|Atonement|Supplication|Sepulchre|Blade of Faith|Blade of Truth|Blade of Valor|Clemency|Holy Spirit|Holy Circle|Confiteor|Fight or Flight|Spirits Within|Sheltron|Sentinel|Cover|Circle of Scorn|Hallowed Ground|Bulwark|Divine Veil|Intervention|Requiescat|Intervene|Holy Sheltron|Expiacion|Guardian|Imperator|Blade of Honor|Rampart|Low Blow|Provoke|Interject|Reprisal|Arm's Length|Shirk)\|(?<targetId>[^|]*)\|(?<target>[^|]*)\|(?<flags>[^|]*)\|(?<damage>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){14}(?<targetCurrentHp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetMaxHp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetCurrentMp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetMaxMp>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){2}(?<targetX>[^|]*)\|(?<targetY>[^|]*)\|(?<targetZ>[^|]*)\|(?<targetHeading>[^|]*)\|(?<currentHp>[^|]*)\|(?<maxHp>[^|]*)\|(?<currentMp>[^|]*)\|(?<maxMp>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){2}(?<x>[^|]*)\|(?<y>[^|]*)\|(?<z>[^|]*)\|(?<heading>[^|]*)\|(?<sequence>[^|]*)\|(?<targetIndex>0)\|(?<targetCount>[^|]*)\|
Trigger.Description:
Weaponskills: Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Total Eclipse|Shield Bash|Shield Lob|Rage of Halone|Prominence|Goring Blade|Royal Authority|Atonement|Supplication|Sepulchre|Blade of Faith|Blade of Truth|Blade of Valor
Spells: Clemency|Holy Spirit|Holy Circle|Confiteor
Abilties: Fight or Flight|Spirits Within|Sheltron|Sentinel|Cover|Circle of Scorn|Hallowed Ground|Bulwark|Divine Veil|Intervention|Requiescat|Intervene|Holy Sheltron|Expiacion|Guardian|Imperator|Blade of Honor|Rampart|Low Blow|Provoke|Interject|Reprisal|Arm's Length|Shirk

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Fast Blade|Riot Blade|Total Eclipse|Shield Bash|Shield Lob|Rage of Halone|Prominence|Goring Blade|Royal Authority|Atonement|Supplication|Sepulchre|Blade of Faith|Blade of Truth|Blade of Valor)$

^(?:Fight or Flight|Spirits Within|Sheltron|Sentinel|Cover|Circle of Scorn|Hallowed Ground|Bulwark|Divine Veil|Intervention|Requiescat|Intervene|Holy Sheltron|Expiacion|Guardian|Imperator|Blade of Honor|Rampart|Low Blow|Provoke|Interject|Reprisal|Arm's Length|Shirk)$
